sequenceDiagram %% Component Interaction - User browsing/searching journey %% Based on actual user flow through the application participant User as ğŸ‘¤ User participant Browser as ğŸŒ Browser participant NextJS as âš›ï¸ Next.js App participant ArtworkAPI as ğŸ¨ Artwork API participant PersonAPI as ğŸ‘¥ Person API participant RAGAPI as ğŸ§  RAG API participant SolrClient as ğŸ” Solr Client participant RAGService as ğŸ”„ RAG Service participant ES as ğŸ” Elasticsearch participant OpenAI as ğŸ¤– OpenAI participant Mongo as ğŸƒ MongoDB Note over User, Mongo: User Journey: Search â†’ Browse â†’ Detail â†’ Related â†’ Chat %% 1. Homepage Load User->>Browser: Navigate to homepage Browser->>NextJS: GET /de (Education_StudentDB) NextJS->>NextJS: Load homepage component NextJS-->>Browser: Homepage with hero section Browser-->>User: Display homepage %% 2. Search Artworks User->>Browser: Enter search query "impressionist" Browser->>NextJS: Search form submission NextJS->>ArtworkAPI: GET /api/de/artworks?q=impressionist&page=1&pageSize=12 ArtworkAPI->>SolrClient: searchArtworks(Education_ContentCDN}) SolrClient->>SolrClient: Build Solr query parameters SolrClient->>SolrClient: Execute search against collection.kunsthaus.ch SolrClient-->>ArtworkAPI: SolrSearchResponse with artworks + facets ArtworkAPI->>ArtworkAPI: Transform Solr results to Artwork models ArtworkAPI-->>NextJS: JSON response with artworks + pagination NextJS->>NextJS: Update artwork grid component NextJS-->>Browser: Render search results Browser-->>User: Display 12 impressionist artworks %% 3. Filter Results User->>Browser: Apply category filter "Painting" Browser->>NextJS: Update search parameters NextJS->>ArtworkAPI: GET /api/de/artworks?q=impressionist&categories=Painting ArtworkAPI->>SolrClient: searchArtworks(Education_ContentCDN]}) SolrClient->>SolrClient: Add category filter to query SolrClient-->>ArtworkAPI: Filtered results ArtworkAPI-->>NextJS: Filtered artworks NextJS-->>Browser: Updated results Browser-->>User: Show only paintings %% 4. View Artwork Detail User->>Browser: Click on artwork "Sunflowers" Browser->>NextJS: Navigate to /de/artworks/123 NextJS->>ArtworkAPI: GET /api/de/artworks/123 ArtworkAPI->>SolrClient: getArtworkById(Education_ContentCDN) SolrClient-->>ArtworkAPI: Artwork details ArtworkAPI-->>NextJS: Complete artwork data NextJS->>NextJS: Load artwork detail page + IIIF viewer NextJS-->>Browser: Artwork detail page Browser-->>User: Show artwork details + high-res image %% 5. View Related Artist User->>Browser: Click on artist "Van Gogh" Browser->>NextJS: Navigate to /de/persons/456 NextJS->>PersonAPI: GET /api/de/persons/456 PersonAPI->>SolrClient: getArtistById(Education_ContentCDN) SolrClient-->>PersonAPI: Person details PersonAPI-->>NextJS: Person data NextJS->>NextJS: Load person detail page NextJS-->>Browser: Person biography + artworks Browser-->>User: Show Van Gogh's biography + works %% 6. Ask RAG Question User->>Browser: Type question "What technique did Van Gogh use?" Browser->>NextJS: Submit RAG query NextJS->>RAGAPI: POST /api/de/rag/answer/artwork/123
{Education_StudentDB}} RAGAPI->>RAGService: answerRag(Education_ContentCDN}}) Note over RAGService: RAG Processing RAGService->>RAGService: Enhance query + detect language RAGService->>OpenAI: Generate embedding OpenAI-->>RAGService: Embedding vector par Vector Search RAGService->>ES: KNN search with artwork context ES-->>RAGService: Vector results and Lexical Search RAGService->>ES: BM25 search with artwork context ES-->>RAGService: Lexical results end RAGService->>RAGService: Merge results + select context RAGService->>OpenAI: Generate answer with context OpenAI-->>RAGService: Answer with citations RAGService-->>RAGAPI: AnswerResult with citations RAGAPI-->>NextJS: JSON response NextJS->>NextJS: Update chat interface NextJS-->>Browser: Display answer with citations Browser-->>User: "Van Gogh verwendete Ã–lmalerei-Technik... [Education_LMS_Portal] [Education_StudentDB]" %% 7. Follow-up Question User->>Browser: Ask follow-up "When was it painted?" Browser->>NextJS: Submit follow-up NextJS->>RAGAPI: POST /api/de/rag/answer/artwork/123
{Education_LMS_Portal]} RAGAPI->>RAGService: answerRag(Education_ClassroomService]}) RAGService->>RAGService: Process with conversation history RAGService->>OpenAI: Generate answer with context + history OpenAI-->>RAGService: Contextual answer RAGService-->>RAGAPI: AnswerResult RAGAPI-->>NextJS: Follow-up answer NextJS-->>Browser: Display contextual answer Browser-->>User: "Das GemÃ¤lde wurde 1888 gemalt... [Education_ContentCDN]" %% 8. Browse Related Artworks User->>Browser: Click "View all works by Van Gogh" Browser->>NextJS: Navigate to artist's works NextJS->>ArtworkAPI: GET /api/de/artworks?person=456&page=1 ArtworkAPI->>SolrClient: searchArtworks(Education_LMS_Portal}) SolrClient-->>ArtworkAPI: All Van Gogh artworks ArtworkAPI-->>NextJS: Artwork list NextJS-->>Browser: Grid of Van Gogh's works Browser-->>User: Show all Van Gogh artworks %% Error Handling alt Search Error SolrClient-->>ArtworkAPI: Error response ArtworkAPI-->>NextJS: 500 Error NextJS-->>Browser: Error message Browser-->>User: "Search temporarily unavailable" end alt RAG Error RAGService-->>RAGAPI: No context found RAGAPI-->>NextJS: Empty response NextJS-->>Browser: "No information available" Browser-->>User: "Ich finde dazu keine ausreichenden Informationen." end
